title: Content-based filtering & collaborative filtering (Building recommendation systems with TensorFlow)
excerpt: In this video we will be walking you through the concepts of content-based filtering and collaborative filtering, which are traditional algorithms for recommendation systems but are useful to help us better understand modern recommenders.
